name: Security Surge
description:
An arcadey, frantic scramble to destroy security bots before they activate

You must race against time in a procedurally generated level to smash security bots before power returns, and they spring back to life. When active, they are not only deadly, but also indestructible, and must be dealt with in other, sneakier ways. One way or the other, you must destroy all the robots before it's too late. Can you get through 10 rounds and survive to tell the tale?

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Arrow Keys - Dash / Look Around
  • Escape - Exit game
  • Space - Confirm

Made in a week for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3.

Theme: On/Off
